actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-20.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-188.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #178 (334-27).

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of June 30, 1954, as amended, providing for the continuance of civil government for the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-188) Increases the authorization ceiling for fiscal year 1975 for the activities of the civil government of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands from $60,000,000 to $75,000,000. Authorizes the appropriation of $1,500,000 to fund the transition of the Mariana Islands District from the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to a new commonwealth status as a territory of the United States if such new status is approved by the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of June 30, 1954, as amended, providing for the continuance of civil government for the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
